name: Ice Canyon - web version
description:
This game was made for the GMTK 2020 game jam.

The theme was "out of control". It was made in about 12 hours (over 2 days) but after players were having some issues with the controls I added a couple of extra levels and tutorial notes once the jam had finished.

This was not only my first game jam but my first game so I hope you enjoy it! :)
